definition: armed enemy of the nation/enemy of the Emperor/fig. championship challenger/contender opposing champion in sporting contest
to defend/to resist
to resist/imperial/(classical) to drive (a chariot)/to manage/to govern
enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand

sentences.english: The males have long, curved horns for defending against enemies.
sentences.chinese: 成年雄性藏羚羊头上长有竖琴形状的角用于御敌。

sentences.english: Our people's support is a bulwark against the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 人民的支持是御敌的强大力量。

sentences.english: The soldiers kept the enemy out of the country.
For thousands of years for the Chinese people exercise or a way of self-defense against an enemy.
sentences.chinese: 几千年来为我国人民锻炼身体或自卫御敌的一种方法。
